title: 'Stop ripping us off': Senate grills Novo Nordisk CEO on weight loss drug pricing
content: Sen. Bernie Sanders argues that Novo Nordisk charges Americans substantially higher prices for its drugs than it does for patients in other countries.
summary: Sen. Bernie Sanders argues that Novo Nordisk charges Americans substantially higher prices for its drugs than it does for patients in other countries.

title: Blackstone and Vista Equity Partners to acquire software maker Smartsheet for $8.4 billion

title: China central bank releases slate of support measures amid a deepening economic slump
content: Beijing will cut the amount of cash banks need to have on hand, known as the reserve requirement ratio, or RRR, by 50 basis points in the near term, People's Bank of China Gov. Pan Gongsheng said.
summary: Beijing will cut the amount of cash banks need to have on hand, known as the reserve requirement ratio, or RRR, by 50 basis points in the near term, People's Bank of China Gov. Pan Gongsheng said.
